text:
Rosetta Gagliardi (born 9 February 1895 Milan – 31 July 1975) was an Italian tennis player. She played at the 1920 Summer Olympics and 1924 Summer Olympics.
She was a roller skating champion. She was the 1919 Italian singles tennis champion. She competed in the mixed doubles with Cesare Colombo in 1920, and women's doubles with Giulia Perelli, in 1924.
